title: Lead Developer - Sitecore
jobDescription:
Education: B.E. Computer Science/IT degree (or any other engineering discipline)


Experience: 5+ years


Work timings: 2 PM to 11 PM IST


Position Requirements:

  • Minimum 5 years of experience with digital content management systems at enterprise scale.
  • Minimum 3 years of experience conceptualizing and architecting the website solutions using Sitecore 9.0 and above.
  • 2 years of experience in driving CMS projects end to end including setup of Reporting, Analytics, Personalization and DAM.
  • Experience within Digital agency/Pharma/Healthcare industry preferred.
  • Knowledge of .NET framework and .NET components in cloud environment.
  • Hands on Experience in managing Sitecore environment.
  • Hands on Experience in managing and monitoring the supportability, performance, and availability of platform.
  • Experience in Evaluating maintenance processes and outcomes.
  • Agile certification will be an added advantage.

Role & Responsibilities:

  • Team lead in charge of the SiteCore architecture & development team
  • Integrating content-driven applications on top of core CMS platform and integrate with E-commerce solutions and search engines.
  • Collaborate with other team members to support execution of the project by working in an agile, rapid development, and prototyping environment.
  • Build and maintain the application knowledge base of the most complex documentation ensuring the team's source build and configuration documentation, manuals and procedures are always up to date and stored in central location.
  • Create web user interface using ASP.NET MVC, HTML, CSS and JavaScript frameworks.
  • Proactively defines metrics and analyzes application performance. Conduct self-directed investigations into data/application irregularities, and proactively identify and resolve potential system problems.

title: Cloud Platform Engineer - B
jobDescription:
A platform engineer is responsible for designing, building, and maintaining the technology platforms and infrastructure that support software applications and services. They work on creating and managing the underlying systems and tools that enable developers to build, deploy, and operate their applications efficiently. The role of a platform engineer can vary depending on the client and the specific requirements of the platform they are working on.



Job Description - Grade Specific
A role that blends active community involvement and significant contributions to project goals, focusing on cloud platform engineering. This individual demonstrates a solid understanding of the principles and practices of platform engineering, especially within cloud environments, and shows proficiency in specific technical areas related to cloud infrastructure, automation, and scalability.Key responsibilities include:Community Involvement: Actively participating in the professional cloud platform engineering community, contributing insights, and staying abreast of the latest trends and best practices.Team Contribution: Making significant contributions to team objectives, particularly in designing, building, and maintaining cloud-based platforms and infrastructure.Technical Proficiency: Exhibiting a good grasp of cloud platform engineering principles and demonstrating expertise in areas such as cloud service providers (AWS, Azure, GCP), containerisation technologies (like Docker and Kubernetes), and infrastructure as code (IaC).Independent Work and Initiative: Expected to work independently on specific tasks, showcasing initiative and problem-solving skills in tackling complex platform engineering challenges.Emerging Leadership: Beginning to take on leadership roles, which may involve mentoring junior engineers, leading smaller project teams, or spearheading specific aspects of a project.

title: React Native Android Developer || Infogain || Bangalore
tagsAndSkills: React Native,Android,Mobile Application Development,Android Application Development,Application,Mobile applications,React.js,Application development
jobDescription:
Your send your applications directly at sneha.chhabria@infogain.com

Job Summary:

An experienced Android developer responsible for designing and developing high-quality Android applications. They should have expertise in Java or Kotlin programming languages and have experience with Android SDK and third-party libraries.


Job Description:Core Skills

  • 6+ Years in IT Industry with 3+ years of experience in building and delivering apps using React Native
  • Experience in building React Native plugins using Java/Kotlin
  • Fullstack mobile: Expertise with React Native and significant experience working across the tech stack, specifically Javascript, React, and React Native. Android are highly desirable.
  • Expert in Android mobile software development using Kotlin, Java, Android Studio & Git.
  • Expert in analyzing, designing, implementing, and troubleshooting mobile applications for highly transactional systems.
  • Solid working knowledge on Redux, React, Expo and Jest.
  • Strong Problem Solving and Analytical Thinking.
  • Proficient with Agile software development life cycle.
  • Experience with REST APIs, XML & JSON.
  • Experience in writing unit test cases
  • Experience with Agile development methodology.
  • Excellent communication and team player with can-do attitude
